abstract.p: Photo of Malerie Marder, with her explanation

block.p: I was upset and I wanted to see what it would look like as a photograph. Essentially I hoped the act of walking up the stairs in my apartment again and again would induce a catharsis. I think there must be something symbolic there for me -- the idea of just sort of leaving something behind. And visually, it has just brought up so many different associations, like Eadweard Muybridge's pictures of a female nude descending a staircase and Alfred Hitchcock's vertiginous staircases.
